AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: born rich
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a wealthy family in the city of Altdorf. [PAWN_pronoun] could sense the winds of magic from a very young age, and [PAWN_possessive] parents had the resources to have [PAWN_possessive] schooling in magic started early. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] abilities are part of the pride of a very prideful family.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wizard's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to mother that was a great wizard. Perhaps [PAWN_pronoun] inherited the skill from her; although that idea is commonly deemed not possible by scholars. Regardless of where the skills came from, they were there and recognized early. [PAWN_possessive] mother taught him the ways of magic as soon as she recognized the talent in [PAWN_objective].She was a very smart woman, and focused on not just magic training, but discipline and a well rounded study regimen.
